name: Happy Little Farm
description:
This game was made for the SoloDevelopment winter 2022 GameJam in  a 72 hour time frame. This game currently lacks audio, but should be quickly resolved in a future patch. Although this game is short, buggy, and has a lot of flaws, I still put my heart and soul into this project, and I hope you enjoy the time you spend playing!

UPDATE # 1: this update fixed most issues in the game, added a tutorial, and audio! I also changed the way some objectives work! and I hope you enjoy this new release!
